AccountName.description: The name of the Bing Ads account

AccountNumber.description: The account number associated with the Bing Ads account

AccountId.description: The unique identifier for the Bing Ads account

TimePeriod.description: The time period for the data

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for the values

AdDistribution.description: The distribution channel where the ad was displayed

AveragePosition.description: The average position where the ad was displayed

LowQualityClicks.description: The total number of low-quality clicks

LowQualityImpressions.description: The total number of low-quality impressions

LowQualityConversions.description: The total number of low-quality conversions

LowQualityConversionRate.description: The conversion rate for low-quality clicks

DeviceType.description: The type of device on which the ad was displayed

PhoneImpressions.description: The total number of phone impressions

PhoneCalls.description: The total number of phone calls generated

Network.description: The network on which the ad was displayed

Assists.description: The total number of assists (click assist impressions)

AccountStatus.description: The status of the Bing Ads account

LowQualityGeneralClicks.description: The total number of low-quality general clicks

LowQualitySophisticatedClicks.description: The total number of low-quality sophisticated clicks

AllConversions.description: The total number of all conversions

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue generated from all conversions

AllConversionRate.description: The rate of all conversions generated

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for all conversions

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The average revenue per each conversion

ViewThroughConversions.description: The total number of view-through conversions

AverageCpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions

ConversionsQualified.description: The total number of qualified conversions

LowQualityConversionsQualified.description: The total number of qualified low-quality conversions

AllConversionsQualified.description: The total number of qualified all conversions

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The total number of view-through conversions qualified

VideoViews.description: The total number of video views

AverageCPV.description: The average cost per video view

VideoViewsAt25Percent.description: The total number of video views at 25%

VideoViewsAt50Percent.description: The total number of video views at 50%

VideoViewsAt75Percent.description: The total number of video views at 75%

CompletedVideoViews.description: The total number of completed video views

TotalWatchTimeInMS.description: The total watch time in milliseconds

AverageWatchTimePerVideoView.description: The average watch time per video view

AverageWatchTimePerImpression.description: The average watch time per impression
